nodes.bodyText: adding these private api features here should not be required? They should be pulled in transitively by whichever public features depend on them?

nodes.bodyText: Hi Completely agree regarding changes to jakartaee feature - This was a temporary solution to release the beta content, and ensure some private API's were made available. - I expect webprofile-9.0 and other tweaks to the features will be ready by next beta - (actually this week)

nodes.bodyText: I don't think you can pull in multiple versions of jdbc like this... you need to pull in just 4.3 and then optionally tolerate the others. ee8 pulls in 4.2 and tolerates 4.3 ... this should be the opposite I think?
